extensions.extension_description: The Ctype PHP Extension is required for type checking functions.
The cURL PHP Extension is required for making HTTP requests.
The DOM PHP Extension is required for working with XML and HTML documents.
The Fileinfo PHP Extension is required for determining the MIME type of files.
The Filter PHP Extension is required for validating and sanitizing data.
The Hash PHP Extension is required for generating hash values.
The Mbstring PHP Extension is required for handling multibyte string operations.
The OpenSSL PHP Extension is required for security features of Laravel.
The PCRE (Perl Compatible Regular Expressions) PHP Extension is required for regular expression operations.
The PDO (PHP Data Objects) PHP Extension is required for database connectivity.
The Session PHP Extension is required for managing user sessions.
The Tokenizer PHP Extension is required for tokenizing PHP code.
The XML PHP Extension is required for working with XML data.
The PDO SQLite Extension is optional for SQLite database support.
The PDO MySQL Extension is optional for MySQL database support.
The PDO MySQL Extension is also used for MariaDB database support (same as PDO MySQL).
The PDO PostgreSQL Extension is optional for PostgreSQL database support.
The PDO SQL Server Extension is optional for SQL Server database support.
